channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Lich
channel.description:
**Lich** (Neutral Killer) - An undead wretch who seeks the throne of Adiart.
Passive 1: Royal Blood - You may put your name forward to become the King.
Passive 2: Gallows Humor - You are immune from death on the night following an execution.
Day Ability 1: Spectral Whisper - Your target will hear nothing but your anonymous chat for a period of 10 seconds. (Like anonymously whispering to them, but also blocking out information others are saying.) 2 uses.
Night Ability 1: Casket Breath - If you are killed, you will take the name/place of your target. Single use. (Note: If you move more than once, the dead person you previously swapped with then has their true class announced and shown. ie: "We discovered PlayerName was actually ClassName!" in chat, and correct class next to their name. Common sense stuff.)
Night Ability 2: Devour Flesh - Kills targeted player (if they're not immune, etc.). Successful kill gives you one additional use of Casket Breath if you have zero. (You will never have 2 or more uses on hand.)
Lore: The Lich is a member of the royal family who was ousted for "unkind behavior toward royal livestock". Exiled to a diseased land, the Lich became an undead, infectious fiend capable of projecting his life essence into others.
Comments: Once you become King, your class is actually converted to...
**Lich King** (Evil) - An evil king bent on causing his subjects pain.
Passive 1: Pass the Torch - If the King dies, a Royal can use his day ability to step forward. If not, a new king will be voted upon.
Day Ability 1: The Royal Finger - The King's next vote for treason will count twice. (1-Day cooldown)
Day Ability 2: Blood Nectar - If you use this after being poisoned and on the day of the poisoning, you will instead gain immunity from murder at night. Single use.
Night Ability 1: Brain Parasite - Your target's votes related to you will not be shown to anyone but them from that point forward. Infinite use. (Makes it appear they're not voting you, etc. - Still counts though. Do it to enough people, and it will look like no one is voting you!)
Lore: Same as Lich, but now you the KING, baby!
Comments: Please note he does NOT have all the same powers as the king. No immunity to occupation, no guards, no decide fate.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Lich
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Ami:

I’m sorry. You haven’t been taking shit well, so I don’t see how you give it out so easily.

I gave out no “shit.” I have received mostly criticism, not what I would call “shit,” shit being useless criticism that does not help build a role (from plex). I have dealt none of this “shit.”

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Lich
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Tormental:

Royal Blood - You may put your name forward to become the King.

We already have enough potential for evil kings (converting)

Tormental:

Your target will hear nothing but your anonymous chat for a period of 10 seconds. (Like anonymously whispering to them, but also blocking out information others are saying.)

Will other players hear this chat?

Tormental:

If you are killed, you will take the name/place of your target.

What purpose does this ability serve the lich? Also, as plex told me:
“People would notice the sudden change in personality” -my memory of something plex said. Not entirely accurate.

Tormental:

Brain Parasite - Your target’s votes related to you will not be shown to anyone but them from that point forward. Infinite use.

People would figure this out after 2-3 uses…

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Lich
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
-goes to kick starter- -watches trailer-

I have a bad memory, but one of the lines go something like this:

“we wanted to make a fantasy RPG game where you didn’t need to sit at a table with a bunch of friends…” -my memory of the kick-starter video

Hmm, what is the most famous fantasy RPG game that requires you and a bucnh of friends sitting a round a table? oh yeah!

D&D.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Lich
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Lore should be changed to match dungeons and dragons, as it is the premier fantasy game;

A lich is a wizard (usually necromancer) who drank the the Elixir of Defilation, which is comprised of ingredients that required evil acts to acquire, such as the blood of infants.

They usually do this because they fear death, and the lich can live forever, provided he continues providing sacrifices.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Lich
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
HI AUNTIE RUBY. I think the goal is to be the very last one standing, have your court’s bodies around your throne. Well, since the Lich is a Necromancer, it would make sense, right!

If they’re dead, they can’t betray you, since you control them as a necromancer!

Read full topic
